login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Using your email and password
forget.password.token.prompt: If you have an account with us, a password reset email has been sent to you.
login.app.account.not.confirm.prompt: Your email is not verified yet.
resend.confirmation.app.prompt: You account have not been confirmed yet. If you did not get any email, press the button below to resend the email
resend.confirmation.app.resend.without.c: If you did not receive your email confirmation letter, enter your email below, and it will be resent
setup.password.app.not.match.repeated.pa: Password does not match Repeat Password
setup.password.prompt: Your account is almost ready. Please login in the next screen to continue
email.confirm.success.prompt: Your email have been confirmed. Please login in the next screen to continue
signup.app.not.matching.prompt: Password doest not match repeat password.
signup.app.prompt: Your account has been created. Please check your email and use the provided link to activate your account.
